message: Let's start fair.  I'm willing to give you a generous share, but I need most of the money to make this worthwhile.
Alice, let's be reasonable. Your offer was way off. I'm proposing a more balanced split that reflects the time pressure we're both under.
I'm willing to compromise, but your offer was too lopsided. Let's split it more evenly this time.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer. It's a fair deal considering the inflation working against me more than you.
